content: **knitted christmas baubles in drops fiesta the piece is worked in the round bottom up with nordic pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsholidaysprinkles drops design pattern fs-050 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference = 21 cm diameter = 7 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 12 red 50 g colour 27 winter carnival 1 bauble weighs approx 12 g without wadding **accessories** wadding left-over cord or yarn for loop **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember the needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get to few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
